name: Wheelie King Challenge
description:
Ok Rookie.
You think you can wheelie with the best.
Well to compete with the best, you must first Complete 50 Levels.
50 levels of tracks designed to test your wheelie skills.
Keep your front wheel of the ground and make your way over jumps and obstacles.
Once you have Completed all 50 Levels then you have earned the right to compete on the Challenge track.
Where you earn XP and Compete on the Leader Board against the world and your friends.
Good Luck Rookie........


Features-
-One tap game play.
-50 Levels to unlock.
-Challenge track, random endless wheelie skill test.
-Game centre leader board.
-Share and compete with friends.


Music (and Sound Effects) by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
